resources.string: The Corona Virus (COVID-19) is legal for different people in different forms. Most people who contract it will begin moderately to moderately and will need to recover without hospitalization.

Pain 
Sore throat 
Diarrhea 
Eye conjunctivitis 
Headache 
Loss of taste or smell 
Skin rash or change of fingers or hands or feet
Difficulty breathing or shortness of breath \nPain or chest pain \nLoss of speech or movement ability
From the time of the infection to the onset of symptoms, it takes 5-6 days on average, but this process can also take up to 14 days.
Your details were sent to an ambulance. Feel better!
